channel.title: Chapter 4 Beyond Classical Search on Exercises of the AIMA book
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 4 Beyond Classical Search on Exercises of the AIMA book

item.title: Exercise 1
item.description: Statement Give the name of the algorithm that results from each of the following special cases: Local beam search with $k = 1$. Local beam search with one initial state and no limit on the number of states retained. Simulated annealing with $T = 0$ at all times (and omitting the termination test). Simulated annealing with $T=\infty$ at all times. Genetic algorithm with population size $N = 1$.
